org.apache.ecs
Interface Element

All Superinterfaces:
ElementRegistry
All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericElement
public interface Element
extends ElementRegistry

This class describes an ElementFactory.

Version:
$Id: Element.java,v 1.4 2003/04/27 09:43:24 rdonkin Exp $
Author:
Stephan Nagy, Jon S. Stevens
